modName: Dremora Lord Thrall and Dragon Priest Thrall
summary: Dremora Lord companion and a Dragon Priest companion too.
descriptionHtml:
Dremora Lord/Dragon Priest companions, normally there are only atronachs, and I wanted a Dremora Lord so I made this.. 
_______________________________________________________________________________________
Conflicting Mods : None
How to install : Drag the .esp file into your Skyrim > Data folder
Req. Mods : None
Information : This is VERY OP at low lvls so if you get it before lvl 10 or so please put the difficulty on master
_______________________________________________________________________________________
To get the tome go to Whiterun > Warmaidens (the place directly to the right, the blacksmith) > on the table to the right will be a spell tome for it. Same thing for the Dragon Priest Tome
_______________________________________________________________________________________
1.1 - Fixed it where it shows up in your spellbook on start.
1.2 - Added a Dragon Priest Thrall
1.3 (coming soon) -  Also a wabbajack spell. And I made the prices more realistic/mana cost and fixed the dremora lord casting time.
author: n00bf0rlyf3
